I have one thing to say:

Shorter cooldown.

Not everyone can see the glory of Viktor.
They shall be enlightened.

By a grey screen preceded by a perfectly aimed Death Ray and a Chaos storm being unleashed unto their feeble bodies.
Science never looked so sexy.
Have you seen Dr. Sheldon Cooper?
Is that a short joke?
ಠ_ರೃ

I swear these things never even crossed my mind when I was drawing the comic, but now I can't erase them from my brain

> {{champion:112}} What you're firing is a rainbow.

You can say that with a straight face and still call yourself a scientist?

{{champion:222}} "I SWEAR OFFICER! SHE SHOT, A RAINBOW AT M-"
{{champion:51}} "Uh huh, sure, and pigs can fly, mermaids are real, bears can talk, and Satan is a gerbil. I've heard it all before from you Jinx, just keeep talkin'."
({{champion:78}}+{{champion:113}}) {{champion:267}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:17}} "..."
*{{champion:113}} flies by from a {{champion:78}} ult as Bristle squeals into the distance*

Ya know... I hadn't thought about that, but you're absolutely right. Post. Fixed.

A wise-guy ehh?

I bet my pencil you aren't a creator of any sorts.

Credit belongs to me whether this is on internet or not, because I am the author. And I have put my signature on it. A watermark would destroy the drawing.
